name: adobe-story-desktop-app
description: An open source desktop app for Adobe Story

scripts.build:all: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win && npm run build:linux
scripts.pack:osx: npm run build:osx && create-dmg "release/osx/Adobe Story CC-darwin-x64/Adobe Story CC.app"
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:win && electron-builder "release/win/Adobe Story CC-win32-ia32" --platform=win --out="release/win/" --config=packager.json
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win

author: Ole Henrik Stabell
